name: Filebrowser-quantum
longDescription: Filebrowser Quantum is an enhanced fork that aims to be the best free self-hosted web-based file manager. It features a modern, responsive interface with advanced capabilities including multiple source support, OIDC authentication with 2FA, ultra-efficient real-time indexing and search, and improved file previews for office documents and videos. The three-component navigation system provides intuitive file browsing with context-aware menus. Developer-friendly features include long-lived API tokens and Swagger documentation. With minimal resource requirements (256 MB RAM) and a lightweight Docker image (180 MB), it's perfect for managing your server files remotely with enterprise-grade features.
description: Advanced self-hosted file manager with real-time search, OIDC/2FA authentication, and enhanced previews
